review_structure.description: Essential structural organization for effective Amazon reviews

core_elements.name: amazonTitle
core_elements.purpose: Attracts attention in search results and communicates core value
guidelines: Keep under 60 characters
Include 1-2 primary keywords
Focus on primary benefit or outcome
Use action-oriented language when possible

core_elements.name: bodyHeader
core_elements.purpose: Expands on title and sets thematic tone for review
guidelines: Can be longer and more descriptive than Amazon title
Keep under 100-150 characters to ensure it fits on one line
Should expand on the main benefit with more detail
Uses decorative formatting that takes minimal vertical space

core_elements.name: openingNarrative
core_elements.purpose: Creates immediate engagement and establishes authenticity
guidelines: Begin with specific incident or experience
Use vivid, sensory language
Establish personal connection to product
Introduce theme if using thematic approach

core_elements.name: experientialSection
core_elements.purpose: Provides authentic usage context and practical insights
guidelines: Document specific usage scenarios
Include unexpected discoveries or applications
Describe integration into daily routines
Balance information and personality

core_elements.name: verdict
core_elements.purpose: Provides clear recommendation and purchase guidance
guidelines: Summarize key value proposition
Balance strengths and limitations
Identify ideal user scenarios
Include price-value assessment
Tie back to opening theme if applicable

core_elements.name: evaluationSection
core_elements.description: Evaluation of product strengths and limitations
core_elements.purpose: Provides balanced assessment of product capabilities
core_elements.usage_guidance: Recommended for products with multiple distinct features; can be omitted for very simple products where including would create redundancy
guidelines: Can be structured as traditional PROS/CONS or with creative alternatives
Balance positive and negative aspects
Front-load factual information before personality
Add personality to 30-40% of list items

core_elements.name: audienceSection
core_elements.purpose: Helps readers self-identify whether product meets their needs
core_elements.usage_guidance: Recommended for products with specific use cases; can be omitted for universal products or when including would be redundant with other sections
guidelines: Identify specific user profiles or scenarios
Include both ideal and non-ideal users
Focus on use cases rather than demographics
Connect to specific product features

core_elements.name: practicalAdvice
core_elements.purpose: Provides actionable guidance from personal experience
core_elements.usage_guidance: Include only when you have unique usage tips not covered elsewhere in the review
guidelines: Focus on discoveries not in product documentation
Include workarounds for limitations
Share efficiency or effectiveness tips
Provide maintenance or longevity advice

optional_custom_elements.description: For complex products requiring additional specialized content
guidance: Create custom sections based on product-specific needs and testing experience
Each custom section should provide unique value not covered by other sections
Custom sections should follow the same formatting conventions as standard sections
Maintain appropriate personality/information balance in custom sections
example_categories: Technical details section for complex electronics
Compatibility information section for ecosystem products
Performance testing results section for comparative products
Learning curve assessment section for complex tools

section_naming.description: Comprehensive guide to creating engaging section headers
fundamental_principles: Section titles should match the product, theme, and your personal style
There are no fixed 'standard' section names - innovate based on what best serves readers
Section titles should clearly communicate purpose while showcasing creativity
Consider how all section names work together to create a cohesive review

formatting_standards.implementation: Place prefix directly before section header text in ALL CAPS

thematic_frameworks.description: Creating consistent themed section headers throughout a review
implementation: Choose a metaphorical domain that naturally connects to the product
Develop a complete set of themed section headers for consistency
Ensure themed headers still clearly communicate section purposes
theme_generation_questions: What metaphorical domain naturally connects to this product's function?
What unexpected comparison came to mind during product testing?
What storytelling framework would make this product's review memorable?

content_organization.description: Core principles for effective information structuring
information_flow: Structure sections to create logical progression of information
Begin with engaging personal experience to establish context
Follow with detailed usage experiences that demonstrate product value
Include evaluation sections that balance strengths and limitations
Add audience identification to help readers determine fit
Include practical advice based on personal experience
End with clear verdict that summarizes overall assessment

lists_enhancement.principle: Add personality to 30-40% of list items
lists_enhancement.implementation: Always place factual content first, personality second

examples.basic: Clear progress indicators for each battery position
examples.enhanced: Clear progress indicators for each battery position (no cryptic blinking patterns to decipher)

principles: Each section should serve a unique informational purpose with minimal overlap
Information should generally appear in its most optimal section only
Later mentions of key points should add new dimensions rather than repeating
Paragraph content, list items, and tips sections should contain distinct information types
redundancy_prevention.note: This section provides structure-specific guidance, while the comprehensive implementation process is centralized in redundancy-verification.json
strategic_exceptions: Key information may be restated when doing so significantly enhances clarity
Critical safety or compatibility information may appear in multiple sections when warranted
Complex technical points may be introduced in technical sections then reframed in simpler terms elsewhere

product_specific_sections.description: Guidelines for adapting review sections to specific product categories
adaptation_principles: Standard review structure should be modified based on product-specific needs
Create custom sections that highlight unique aspects of product category
Rename standard sections to align with product terminology when appropriate
Balance consistency with customization for optimal reader experience

section_adaptation_process.step: Identify unique attributes of product category
Determine which standard sections require modification
Design specialized sections to highlight category-specific aspects
Ensure all required elements are still covered
Maintain consistent formatting and style conventions

implementation_guidance: Create product-specific sections only when they add unique value
Maintain consistent formatting between standard and specialized sections
Ensure specialized sections follow the same information/personality balance principles
Use specialized vocabulary where appropriate but explain terms when necessary

image_integration.description: Framework for effectively incorporating and referencing images in review content

reference_principles.name: specificity
reference_principles.description: Direct references to visual details in images

reference_principles.name: contextEnhancement
reference_principles.description: Use images to strengthen written points

actions: Identify key visual elements requiring documentation
Plan image sequence to support review flow
List specific details to highlight in each image
Reference images near relevant text sections

mobile_considerations.description: Special formatting considerations for mobile device readability
guidelines: Test text-based formatting on mobile devices before standardizing
Use line breaks strategically for mobile reading
Ensure section headers are immediately visible without scrolling
Favor shorter paragraphs (2-3 sentences) for mobile readability
Use consistent spacing for improved mobile scannability
mobile_specific_adjustments: Avoid extremely wide decorative elements that might wrap awkwardly
Use dividers that display well at narrower widths
Keep section prefixes brief for better mobile display
Test formatting on multiple screen sizes for optimal display
implementation_guidance: When in doubt, choose simplicity for better cross-device compatibility
Focus on clear visual hierarchy that works at any screen width
Test all your reviews on mobile before submission
